api_list.name: Get Comments List by  Shortcode
api_list.description:
Get comments list via shortcode. you can get more data using minid. The response will include this part:
"nextminid": "{"servercursor": "QVFEdjNRSEU5SFY4SzR5TE00MV9ISmh6STZfV1dwcnBxbGlPYlhuZTl3T3lvVW4zYVNETXc0YWVHSnJQTHNKR25ncXE1RFdCT2MzTEhTVWpGMTBBNlhIaw==", "isservercursorinverse": true}"
and the minid will be:
"QVFEdjNRSEU5SFY4SzR5TE00MV9ISmh6STZfV1dwcnBxbGlPYlhuZTl3T3lvVW4zYVNETXc0YWVHSnJQTHNKR25ncXE1RFdCT2MzTEhTVWpGMTBBNlhIaw=="

api_list.name: Get Comments List by Media Id
api_list.description:
Get comments list via media id. you can get more data using minid. The response will include this part:
"next_min_id": "{"server_cursor": "QVFEdjNRSEU5SFY4SzR5TE00MV9ISmh6STZfV1dwcnBxbGlPYlhuZTl3T3lvVW4zYVNETXc0YWVHSnJQTHNKR25ncXE1RFdCT2MzTEhTVWpGMTBBNlhIaw==", "is_server_cursor_inverse": true}"
and the minid will be:
"QVFEdjNRSEU5SFY4SzR5TE00MV9ISmh6STZfV1dwcnBxbGlPYlhuZTl3T3lvVW4zYVNETXc0YWVHSnJQTHNKR25ncXE1RFdCT2MzTEhTVWpGMTBBNlhIaw=="

api_list.name: Get Likers app chrono by Shortcode
api_list.description: Get the last 1000 likes of a post via shortcode

api_list.name: Get Likers app chrono by Media Id
api_list.description: Get the last 1000 likes of a post via media id

api_list.name: Get Likers List app by Shortcode
api_list.description: Get the list of people who has liked a post via shortcode and app method

api_list.name: Get Likers List app by Media Id
api_list.description: Get the list of people who has liked a post via media id and app method

api_list.name: Media info by Shortcode
api_list.description: Get any post information such as photos, videos, igtvs, reels , . . . when you have the shortcode. Shortcode is usually shown this way in Url: instagram.com/p/{shortcode}

api_list.name: Get Likers List Web by Media Id
api_list.description: Get the list of people who has liked a post via media id and web method

api_list.name: Get Likers List Web by Shortcode
api_list.description: Get the list of people who has liked a post via shortcode and web method

api_list.name: Media info by Media Id
api_list.description: Get any post information such as photos, videos, igtvs, reels , . . . when you have the id

api_list.name: Search among Followings by Username
api_list.description: search any query in an Instagram account followings when you have the username, it can be one part or the whole username or full name

api_list.name: Search among Followings by pk
api_list.description: search any query in an Instagram account followings when you have the pk, it can be one part or the whole username or full name

api_list.name: Get Followings by Username
api_list.description: Get lists of any public Instagram account followings via pk

api_list.name: Get Followings by pk
api_list.description: Get lists of any public Instagram account followings via pk

api_list.name: Search among Followers by Username
api_list.description: search any query in an Instagram account followers when you have the username, it can be one part or the whole username or full name

api_list.name: Search among Followers by pk
api_list.description: search any query in an Instagram account followers when you have the pk, it can be one part or the whole username or full name

api_list.name: Get Followers by Username
api_list.description: Get lists of any public Instagram account followers via username

api_list.name: Get Followers by pk
api_list.description: Get lists of any public Instagram account followers via pk

api_list.name: User Posts By Username
api_list.description: Get all posts contents including photos, videos, reels, igtvs, and etc via username

api_list.name: User Posts By pk
api_list.description: Get all posts of any Instagram account via pk. including photos, videos, Igtv, reels and etc.

api_list.name: Shortcode to Media id
api_list.description:
Each Media on Instagram has a unique id like 2931558439012794055, but in the Url you will see it this way: https://www.instagram.com/p/Ciu_N9Qpm5d/
This endpoint will converts Ciu_N9Qpm5d to 2931558439012794055

api_list.name: User Stories By Username
api_list.description: Get all stories of any Instagram account via username

api_list.name: User Stories By pk
api_list.description: Get all stories via pk

api_list.name: Media id to Shortcode
api_list.description:
Each Media on Instagram has a unique id like 2931558439012794055, but in the Url you will see it this way: https://www.instagram.com/p/Ciu_N9Qpm5d/
This endpoint will converts 2931558439012794055 to Ciu_N9Qpm5d

api_list.name: User info by username
api_list.description: Get all information of an Instagram account by  username

api_list.name: User info by pk
api_list.description: Get all information about an Instagram account by pk (the unique id of Instagram account) such as username, profile_pic_url (hd), full_name, media_count, follower_count, following_count and etc

api_list.name: Hashtag Feed
Hashtag Info
api_list.description: Get all information about a specific hashtag on Instagram

api_list.name: Search Hashtag
api_list.description: Search any hashtag on instagram

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: search any query on Instagram

api_list.name: username to pk convert
api_list.description: it converts any username on instagram to the unique id which is called pk
